 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺבַע‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==helmet== (word of peculiar form, and dubious √; probably foreign word; compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***turban, tiara, cowl***, so Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺבְעָא‎</span> ***turban***); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Ezek.23.24|Ezek 23:24]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק֫וֺבַע נְחשֶׁת‎</span> [[1Sam.17.38|1Sam 17:38]]. — compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּוֺבַע‎</span>.
